data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Western, Sierra Leone to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Western, Sierra Leone
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 72,002 believers in Western that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.section_summary: On average, 186 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Western, Sierra Leone.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Western, Sierra Leone.
Father, help the 72,002 believers in Western to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Temne-Banta people. Make the Temne-Banta people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Western, Sierra Leone to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 72,002 believers in Western, Sierra Leone to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Western, Sierra Leone to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

location.name: Western
location.people_groups_list: Gola, Limba, West, Kissi, Southern, Limba, East, Kuranko
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Gola (16,000), Limba, West (521,000), Kissi, Southern (133,000), Limba, East (800), Kuranko (420,000)
